entry.title: A chronological overview of common Chinese medicine treatment methods

entry.title: Cure or heal: health behaviors and health beliefs among older adults with chronic diseases in rural China

entry.title: From new medicine to drug overuse: the magic bullet in China (1910–1940)
entry.summary: Article by Jingyi Pang DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/ajmedh-2024-0023
